definitions.definition: a school or class to prepare children aged five for school

examples.text: James is in kindergarten now, but he's moving up to infant school this autumn.
She teaches reading to students in kindergarten.
She was still attending kindergarten at Assumption School.
their plans for Hannah to start all-day kindergarten

definitions.definition: nursery school (= a school for children between the ages of about two and five)
definitions.labels: (British English, Australian English, New Zealand English)

wordOrigin: mid 19th cent.: from German, literally ‘children's garden’.
